title: Tin Shortsword
summaries: The Tin Shortsword is the tin equivalent of the Copper Shortsword (when a world is spawned with Tin Ore instead of Copper Ore during world creation), and is the second weakest of all the shortswords, being only more effective than the Copper Shortsword.

Like all shortswords, the Tin Shortsword has a very limited range and attacks with a stabbing motion at any direction on <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile</linked>, and horizontally in front of the player on <linked>[img:Old-gen console version]</linked><linked> Old-gen console</linked>, <linked>3DS</linked><linked>[img:Nintendo 3DS version]</linked>, and <linked>[img:Legacy tModLoader version]</linked><linked> Legacy tModLoader</linked>, instead of an arc. This makes it almost useless against flying or jumping enemies, although its high attack rate makes it somewhat effective against weaker <linked>fighter</linked> type enemies.
